snippet: TANANBAUM--Stanley. Beloved uncle who sailed and flew through life. Ever dapper, ever the proud businessman. Adored his late wife Doris. Our deepest condolences to children Andrew Tananbaum (Dorothy) and Ricki Gail Conway (Robert) and his many grandchildren and great-grandchildren. Janet and Rudolph de Winter David and Deedy Goldstick 1/3
lead_paragraph: TANANBAUM--Stanley. Beloved uncle who sailed and flew through life. Ever dapper, ever the proud businessman. Adored his late wife Doris. Janet and Rudolph de Winter David and Deedy Goldstick 1/3
